solution_line_template: Yvonne swims {yvonne_laps} laps in 5 minutes and her younger sister swims half as many laps in 5 minutes so she swims {yvonne_laps}/{sister_divisor} = <<{yvonne_laps}/{sister_divisor}={sister_laps}>>{sister_laps} laps in 5 minutes

Joel can swim {joel_multiplier} times the amount of his youngest sister's {sister_laps} laps so he can swim {joel_multiplier}*{sister_laps} = <<{joel_multiplier}*{sister_laps}={joel_laps}>>{joel_laps} laps in 5 minutes
